content.rendered:
Robotics Summit Academic Outreach Program

Complimentary and discounted registrations available for academic groups
to attend international robotics engineering event.

The Robotics Summit Academic Outreach Program provides colleges, universities and research centers with an excellent forum for students, academicians and others to network with their academic and industry peers from throughout the world and build institute awareness.

The Robotics Summit & Expo is also a great opportunity for students and researchers to meet with companies seeking top robotics and engineering talent at the MassRobotics Career Fair.

Two Opportunities to Participate
Under the Robotics Summit Association Outreach Program, students, researchers and educators can participate in the Robotics Summit & Expo in two different ways:

  • Two Complimentary Full Conference Passes – Colleges, universities and research institutions are provided with two complimentary full conference passes to the Robotics Summit & Expo.
  • Discounts on Full Conference Passes – Once the two complimentary full conference passes are utilized, researchers and educators can register for a full conference pass to the Robotics Summit & Expo at special academic rates.

Registration and Information
To apply to the Robotics Summit Academic Outreach Program, or to receive additional information, please contact events@wtwhmedia.com.

Representatives from the following universities and research institutions attended the Robotics Summit & Expo 2019:
